sn22.57:1.2: “Sattatthanakusalo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tividhupaparikkhi imasmim dhammavinaye kevali vusitava uttamapurisoti vuccati.
sn22.57:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rupam pajanati, rupasamudayam pajanati, rupanirodham pajanati, rupanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati;
sn22.57:1.5: rupassa assadam pajanati, rupassa adinavam pajanati, rupassa nissaranam pajanati;
sn22.57:1.9: vinnanam pajanati, vinnanasamudayam pajanati, vinnananirodham pajanati, vinnananirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati;
sn22.57:1.10: vinnanassa assadam pajanati, vinnanassa adinavam pajanati, vinnanassa nissaranam pajanati.
sn22.57:2.2: Cattaro ca mahabhuta, catunnanca mahabhutanam upadaya rupam.
sn22.57:2.6: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo rupanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn22.57:3.1: Yam rupam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
sn22.57:4.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam rupam abhinnaya, evam rupasamudayam abhinnaya, evam rupanirodham abhinnaya, evam rupanirodhagaminim patipadam abhinnaya;
sn22.57:4.2: evam rupassa assadam abhinnaya, evam rupassa adinavam abhinnaya, evam rupassa nissaranam abhinnaya rupassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanna, te suppatipanna.
sn22.57:4.3: Ye suppatipanna, te imasmim dhammavinaye gadhanti.
sn22.57:5.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam rupam abhinnaya, evam rupasamudayam abhinnaya, evam rupanirodham abhinnaya, evam rupanirodhagaminim patipadam abhinnaya;
sn22.57:5.2: evam rupassa assadam abhinnaya, evam rupassa adinavam abhinnaya, evam rupassa nissaranam abhinnaya rupassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutta, te suvimutta.
sn22.57:5.4: Ye kevalino vattam tesam natthi pannapanaya.
sn22.57:6.8: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo vedananirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn22.57:7.1: Yam vedanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
sn22.57:8.1: Ye hi, keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam vedanam abhinnaya, evam vedanasamudayam abhinnaya, evam vedananirodham abhinnaya, evam vedananirodhagaminim patipadam abhinnaya;
sn22.57:8.2: evam vedanaya assadam abhinnaya, evam vedanaya adinavam abhinnaya, evam vedanaya nissaranam abhinnaya vedanaya nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanna, te suppatipanna.
sn22.57:8.3: Ye suppatipanna, te imasmim dhammavinaye gadhanti.
sn22.57:9.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam vedanam abhinnaya …pe…
sn22.57:10.3: rupasanna, saddasanna, gandhasanna, rasasanna, photthabbasanna, dhammasanna.
sn22.57:10.7: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo sannanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn22.57:11.8: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo sankharanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn22.57:12.1: Yam sankhare paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
sn22.57:13.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam sankhare abhinnaya, evam sankharasamudayam abhinnaya, evam sankharanirodham abhinnaya, evam sankharanirodhagaminim patipadam abhinnaya …pe… sankharanam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanna te suppatipanna.
sn22.57:13.2: Ye suppatipanna, te imasmim dhammavinaye gadhanti …pe…
sn22.57:14.3: cakkhuvinnanam, sotavinnanam, ghanavinnanam, jivhavinnanam, kayavinnanam, manovinnanam.
sn22.57:14.7: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo vinnananirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn22.57:15.1: Yam vinnanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
sn22.57:16.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam vinnanam abhinnaya, evam vinnanasamudayam abhinnaya, evam vinnananirodham abhinnaya, evam vinnananirodhagaminim patipadam abhinnaya;
sn22.57:16.2: evam vinnanassa assadam abhinnaya, evam vinnanassa adinavam abhinnaya, evam vinnanassa nissaranam abhinnaya vinnanassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanna, te suppatipanna.
sn22.57:16.3: Ye suppatipanna, te imasmim dhammavinaye gadhanti.
sn22.57:17.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam vinnanam abhinnaya, evam vinnanasamudayam abhinnaya, evam vinnananirodham abhinnaya, evam vinnananirodhagaminim patipadam abhinnaya;
sn22.57:17.2: evam vinnanassa assadam abhinnaya, evam vinnanassa adinavam abhinnaya, evam vinnanassa nissaranam abhinnaya vinnanassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutta, te suvimutta.
sn22.57:17.4: Ye kevalino vattam tesam natthi pannapanaya.
sn22.57:17.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattatthanakusalo hoti.
sn22.57:18.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhatuso upaparikkhati, ayatanaso upaparikkhati, paticcasamuppadaso upaparikkhati.
sn22.57:18.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tividhupaparikkhi hoti.
sn22.57:18.4: Sattatthanakusalo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tividhupaparikkhi, imasmim dhammavinaye kevali vusitava ‘uttamapuriso’ti vuccati”ti.
